name: VIMworld
intro: Blockchain-powered SmartNFT platform and open metaverse
introduce: VIMworld is a next generation, blockchain-powered SmartNFT platform and open metaverse. In VIMworld, users collect and interact with SmartNFTs called VIMs, going through various interactive and rewarding experiences with them across worlds. User's personal VIM grows alongside they across various experiences, games and interactions, and no one VIM carries the same story. Mature and high level VIMs can even work for users, earning benefits and rewards while they sleep!
